means: 猫叫春声，哀诉声，抱怨声叫春似的
叫春，发尖叫声，（象猫一样地）吵架（ caterwaul的现在分词 ）

sentence.Network_en: And then there came, mingling with his half - formed dreams , a most melancholy caterwauling.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来在他迷迷糊糊 、 似睡非睡的状态中,从外面传来一阵非常凄惨的猫儿叫春的声音.
孩子们,别像猫似的乱叫!

entry.def: If a person or animal caterwauls, they make a loud, high, unpleasant noise like the noise that cats make when they fight.
